original_text: Make ye him drunken: for he magnified himself against the Lord: Moab also shall wallow in his vomit, and he also shall be in derision.
korean_text: 모압으로 취하게 할지어다 이는 그가 여호와에 대하여 교만함이라 그가 그 토한 것에서 뒹굴므로 조롱 거리가 되리로다

sentences.original_text: for he magnified himself against the Lord:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주를 거스려 자신을 높였기 때문이라:

sentences.original_text: Moab also shall wallow in his vomit,
sentences.korean_translation: 모압도 또한 그의 토함물 속에서 뒹굴 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and he also shall be in derision.
